title: Many bugs and errors, but otherwise a good game
text: So let‚Äôs just start of by saying, this game is awesome, but it has some issues. Just recently I tried to play the game and I hit online and yes I know for some people they can‚Äôt play online but that‚Äôs really the only fun option on this game. I hit the online button and it went to the screen where you click host, private, or public. I clicked on public, but it said you have disconnected from this server, try again later. Although it did say to check my internet connection, I had full bars. Another thing is, when I didn‚Äôt like the game I was on, I left the game. When I tried to hit public again, it just said, you need to wait 18 mins before playing because of unintentionally leaving a game. At this point I was really mad so I got on roblox. That‚Äôs about all the bad stuff on my end, but I do like lots of things. I love the new roles, it gets rid of the same old crew mate or imposter. Another thing I like about it is the new customization thing, and all the other tiny things in this latest update, keep this game great. If not for these errors it would be a 5 star from me, üëã

title: Amazing Game! But one request...
text:
So, i have had among us for maybe a year now. I absolutely love this game but I wish they can do something about the new update. I understand how people can say very inappropriate things and also have inappropriate names but i believe its unfair for people who just want to play. I am fine with quick chat but i wish they add more options that are very specific like a normal person would- also letting us make our own names again. I love the name randomizer as there are some funny names i had a small laugh at. I feel like the biggest part of among us was communicating with others.I loved joking around with the other players and having such a great time with them. But now it‚Äôs almost robot-like. I appreciate the effort the programers put into the app and hopefully will listen to our pleas (as there are others with the same opinion) and make a few small updates :) 
But overall, among us is a great game to play with friends and strangers. Me and my family/friends love to play with each other for laughs. The game has amazing graphics and gameplay with very little flaws. It is extremely fun for most ages and i suggest that you should play too.

title: Amazing, but some complaints.
text:
This game is great, and it helped a lot of people get through quarantine. There is a few annoying things though. Say some host bans you after a game for winning as an imposter or winning as crew-mate when they were imposter. Another thing, sometimes I am my main color (black) and somebody else joins and wants black. I say no, because I had it first, and they must be friends with the host or something, because 5 seconds later I get banned for being black. It is so annoying! I know you can‚Äôt change this, but I thought it was worth mentioning. Another thing is, you should be able to report discord cheaters or hackers, because they make the game really unfair and defeat the purpose of the game, which is to find out the imposter(s). Enough with the negative, let‚Äôs talk about the positive stuff. This game is amazing in almost all ways, and I love it! I love how you can customize your game settings, and join others‚Äô games. You can also choose how many imposters you want. I prefer two, as with 3, the imposters win immediately and with one, the imposter is under a lot of pressure because of how many people they have to kill. 
Anyway, have a good Christmas!
Farewell, Chloe

title: I love this game but there is some problems.
text: I love this game so much!! During quarantine this has been the best game to play and even after quarantine is over! I love to play this game in my free time in public games or with my friends! I love how it makes you think a lot and some people have their own strategy! For example, if your imposter someone‚Äôs strategy could be to go crazy and kill everyone while some people‚Äôs strategy is to gain everyone‚Äôs trust and it‚Äôs so fun!! I just don‚Äôt like how many glitches that there is and I know that they can‚Äôt really fix this but the hackers are also really annoying. Also I want it to were when you are looking for a game then it updates because sometimes when I try and join a game it will say four out of ten but then it‚Äôs full and when it says seven out of ten I can join and it‚Äôs very triggering. I also don‚Äôt like that I will play about 30 rounds and I only get imposter like 2 or 3 times and that‚Äôs also very annoying. Overall I love this game but there are a few things that are annoying or just trigger me, but I do love this game so much and don‚Äôt know what I would do without it!!!

title: Not much but PLZ GET RID OF THE TASK BAR!!!
text:
First of all, I will not be reviewing the how good the concept is or how fun the game is. This is just to bring up a tedious problem I encountered when playing Among Us. Firstly, I get many server errors a lot of the time and I don‚Äôt think it is on my end. That is not the major problem I‚Äôm going to discuss here. One problem that I came about just recently is that I get disconnected from matches mid game. The tedious part about this is that when I try to enter a new match, there is a message saying that I can‚Äôt join another game for 5 minutes because of intentionally leading. This is a major problem that prevents me from enjoying the game.

Also, task bars give away the impostor easily. If the crew wanted to, they could ask each person to do a task. The impostors would easily be caught bc of this. I believe that the reason why impostors should be caught is through deduction, not visually seeing that someone faked a task. The task bar makes the game so much worse this way. It is too easy to prove someone a crewmate or another person an impostor by looking at the task bar. This is why the task bar should be removed from among us :)

title: Lots of Bugs I‚Äôm Experiencing
text: Among Us is a great game, and overall a great concept, however I experienced several bugs. I keep getting kicked from the game with a notification that says ‚ÄúSent 6 pings that the remote has not responded to‚Äù or something like that. I also get kicked with a notification saying I‚Äôm playing an old version of Among Us but I see no available updates. Fixing the issue of being able to click already full servers would be helpful, as well as doing something about when people leave a game and it ending instantly. Some other suggestions that I want to offer is that when someone is typing in the chat, it could show which color is currently typing using ellipses ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù , kind of like what snapchat does with bitmojis. This way people know that the person is formulating a response and not just ignoring the question. Maybe even implementing voice chat in the future? Another suggestion is to start saving a score board of people who have the most kills as imposter, and recognition of other achievements in the game. There are a lot of good ideas that can stem from such a simple game, like making a realistic first-person version and even a VR version. But fixing these simple bugs first would be a great start.

title: I like the looks of this game but it‚Äôs not playable for me.
text: I just got this app and right from the start I knew it was gonna start to kick me out multiple times. So once I got on the main screen I clicked online and then I wanted to join a game so when I did it automatically kicked me out and I tried this like 3 more times and it continued to keep kicking me out. So then I thought why don‚Äôt I make a game. And so I did. But once I got 10 people in my game it kicked me out again once the game started. title: Hackers populate game‚Ä¶ but gg
text: Okay, let me get this straight. I don‚Äôt know how, but some players have been CLEARLY hacking the game. For example, I was simply strolling through a hall, taking a look inside navigation. I. Stopped. Dead. There was two bodies there, in the exact same corner. Don‚Äôt ask me how, but I immediately spammed on the ‚Äúreport‚Äù button at the corner of the screen üì∫which didn‚Äôt even do a thing. Feeling anxious, I rushed to the emergency üö® room and called a meeting. Oh, in case you hadn‚Äôt already guessed, IT DIDN‚ÄôT WORK. I got really mad and annoyed, now, especially when I came back to navigation just to see ANOTHER body on the floor. Many players started crowding around the bodies questioningly, but no reports were called or meetings. Eventually the imposters killed off most of the crewmates and won. That was just really annoying. I enjoy this game a lot, but that was just FRUSTRATING. No offense, innersloth. I don‚Äôt mind the quick chat like some over dramatic people and got used to it, and got a great randomized name first try. I enjoy this game and look forward for upcoming updates!üòÉ

title: Improvement + ratings
text:
I‚Äôve been playing this game since it first came out and I absolutely love it! title: This Could Have Been an Amazing Game‚Ä¶
text:
Before all the updates, this review would have been 5 stars. All these updates ruined the game.
  One thing I don‚Äôt like is you can‚Äôt chat. It might just be because I‚Äôm on mobile, but still, people should still be able to chat. Now, we have a few tabs with options to chat. It becomes harder to lie and defend yourself to the point it‚Äôs not fun.
  Secondly, I cannot play the game anymore. I‚Äôll try to go and find a server, but it‚Äôll come up with something to not allow me. I believe it‚Äôs because of the update. Before the updates, it‚Äôd load quickly, so I believe it‚Äôs because of the updates.
   Lastly, when I could get into games, it would take forever to load. It‚Äôd take 30-45 seconds. Sometimes by the time I loaded in, we‚Äôd be in a meeting. I‚Äôm sure multiple people would agree with my reasons as multiple friends of mine deleted it after the updates for these same reasons. I would bet others did too.
   If any developer sees this, I first would like to congratulate on your success with this game. However, you‚Äôve probably lost many players because of all the updates. If you could remove the long load into games and the chat tabs, I would definitely download it again, and wouldn‚Äôt delete it because all the fun that was in the game is back.

title: Overall a good game, but quite a few issues
text:
Among Us is a great game that keeps you captivated as you strategize how to stay unsuspected as the imposter or deduct who is betraying you as a crewmate. You could play this game for hours and never get bored because each game plays out differently with a new set of obstacles to overcome. 
I love playing this game, but there are some areas where Among Us needs to be fixed. Other than the occasional glitched map or gameplay, the biggest issue for me is joining an online game. Most times when you go to click on a game to join that seemingly has anywhere from 1 to 7 spots open, you are met with an error message saying that the lobby is full or the game has already started. On the other hand, you can sometimes joint game with 6 or more openings, but it takes a really long time for it to fill up to 10 players so you can actually start a game. Because of this, it often takes me seven or eight tries to finally join a game that‚Äôll start somewhat quickly, and the time wasted doing that can be really frustrating. I think there should be a better way of joining online games because it really degrades the experience when it takes several minutes for you to actually get in a game.

title: Very entertaining!
text: Among us is a jaw dropping game for all ages. With a variety of appearances to pick from, and a handful of colors and hats. The creative animations to go along with it, and the sounds too! Whenever someone kills me, I like the sounds they make, so I‚Äôm fine with being killed! The unlimited options a creativity really proves how much the creator(s) put into the game. If your scrolling through the reviews and haven‚Äôt downloaded the game yet, to download it! I promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Ever since I showed my mom it, she‚Äôs been playing nonstop. It‚Äôs among us is the rage for 2020, it‚Äôs very unlikely to find someone who doesn‚Äôt know about the game. Over millions of fans have come up with animatics, theories, stories, and so much more. With over 50 appearance combinations, and playing with your friends, it really deserves a round of applause! I enjoy the simple tasks, just before heading over to security to see if the imposter snacked on a crew mate. You‚Äôll find all of your favorite YouTubers playing the game! Download now, before the creators decide to make the game something you have to purchase, or get any other bright ideas! üòÇüòÇ

title: Suggestion
text:
Hey Innersloth, I love playing your game, Among Us, my best friends and I play it a lot. I don‚Äôt know if you guys are taking suggestions or not, I mean not that you guys need any suggestions, but I have an idea that I think is good. My idea is that when we enter the game and start the game, people shouldn‚Äôt leave during the game, i mean before and after is fine, but during the game people constantly leave and it‚Äôs annoying and not fair for the other players, I say this because when people leave the game ends early, and when they are killed and turned into ghosts they shouldn‚Äôt leave because they need to help the other crew mates win the game. I don‚Äôt know if you guys think it‚Äôs a good idea, but personally I do, because people leave during the game just because their not imposters, like that‚Äôs really annoying and not how the game works and they leave during the game, and when the imposters do a bad job on killing the players and they get caught, they‚Äôll just leave and that will just end the game early which is ANNOYING. Oh and if they exit out the app during game, they should have a penalty.
Thank you for your time!!

title: better before .
text: So I get the fact that they wanted to make this game more kid friendly because at the time it got so much hype around it, but I feel censoring bad Language was good enough. Though I did like they had you sign in through something to prove you are like an actual person who can play the game . title: Great game, a couple suggestions
text:
This game is fantastic.  It‚Äôs really taken the world by storm and it deserves all the accolades it‚Äôs received.  The recent update, however, has created a few minor issues.  The most notable are 1) sometimes the majority of the crew gets kicked from the game for no reason, leaving only a couple players left.  2) sometimes everyone gets the cutscene where the imposter makes a kill, so we all know who did it.  Other than that, it‚Äôs just generally slower and glitchier than before.  But I do really like all the new features.

The other thing I‚Äôd like to point out is how out of hand some of the players are getting.  I know this happens with any online game but it would be nice to have a way to report players for extreme verbal aggression or abuse.  Maybe something where you have to take the time to fill out WHY you feel the player is being abusive, to discourage players from reporting each other purely out of poor sportsmanship.

Other than those things, it really is a fantastic game, and I would absolutely give it 5 stars if not for the recent update‚Äôs extreme lag and frequent glitches.  Thanks for all your hard work, devs, and keep it up!

title: Recommend the game, but could use some updates!!

title: Freeplay Suggestions
text:
Edit 1: In addition to the features listed below, I think there should be a ‚ÄòSearch‚Äô feature when looking for public games. My friends and I tried playing but he couldn‚Äôt find my game. We had to use private. It would have been much easier to have a search feature. Also, some games say that they have 7/10 people or something and I try to join, then get ‚ÄúServer Full‚Äù. Is this a bug?

Old Review: Among Us is a great game to play for a ‚ÄòClue‚Äô feeling. You can play with others on the same WiFi, online with players around the world, or you can use Freeplay. Freeplay is really just a practice mode, but it doesn‚Äôt feel like a normal Among Us session. If the developers could have the A.I.s move around to do tasks, that would be cool. Also, when A.I.s are moving around, if they see you doing imposter-y things, they will find the shortest path to the ‚ÄòEmergency Meeting‚Äô button and say in the chat ‚ÄúI saw ___ kill Dummy _!‚Äù. If the developers added these features, it would be much cooler. It would also be better if the chat filter and name filter were stronger - Among Us players find ways to bypass this filter. Please make these changes to the game! Keep updating - I‚Äôm cheering!

title: Friends system
text:
Overall, this is a beautiful and well-developed game. I had stopped playing for a while and was pleasantly surprised by different roles when I came back. These make the game absorbing and hilarious!

Now that the excellence of this game as been established, I‚Äôd like to point out a few issues. First and foremost is glitches. This particular one happens in nearly every game I play: the impostor doesn‚Äôt even do anything, they don‚Äôt even see the cafeteria, and all of a sudden a dead body is reported and they‚Äôre accused (and kicked). Or if you‚Äôre a crew mate, you just open up to a dead body and when no one has gotten a chance to even move.

Second, and this is a (much appreciated) suggestion as opposed to a glitch: please, please introduce a friend system! I can tell you‚Äôre on your way (after all, accounts have been established), but I would love to see this change! I have some people I‚Äôve loved playing with, but I never get to see them again, and it‚Äôs heartbreaking because I don‚Äôt find those kinds of people very often. I‚Äôd love to see a friend system so that I could keep in touch with other players.

title: Few problems, few ideas
text: So iv‚Äôe been playing among us for 6 months now and I love the game. But the quick chat? It‚Äôs making me want to delete the app a little. The ‚Äú quick‚Äù part of it is just not right. It takes SO much longer to do that then to just type. Just please, remove the quick chat . You guys WILL lose maybe half your players in the next 2 weeks. Some things you could add is 1. A chat for impostors. Imagine 6 people left and there are 2 imposters. You could tell the imposter ‚Äú I‚Äôm in admin. Let‚Äôs get a double kill!‚Äù  2. New gamemodes and Roles!! Maybe medic, detective, and even a shark, sniper, etc. You could add new gamemodes like hide and seek, massacre where everyone is an imposter, and last man wins and maybe even something like Tad rush like the firs person done with tasks wins! 3. Please add new FREE pets and FREE skins. Me for example, I‚Äôm not allowed to buy stuff from games and it will help people like me customize outer characters! Anyway, overall the game is amazing, but the ‚Äúquick‚Äù chat makes it a little worse. Sorry I made the review so long but please think about adding my ideas and have a good rest of your day!

title: Hosts hold too much power
text:
Ok so I feel like hosts hold too much power. And I‚Äôm not talking about the game settings, I‚Äôm talking about kicking/banning. So when your in the lobby the host can directly kick/ban you but while your playing the game the host has to get many people to vote to kick them. I wish it was like that in the lobby too. I‚Äôve gotten banned for catching the host for being imposter. The host cussed me out and told me to die. And all I had said was gg (good game). I‚Äôve also gotten banned for being the imposter and the crewmates were so close to winning but I (the imposter) won instead. People ban for no reason. So I feel that at least three people have to vote to ban someone. (Or even two if there are less people in the lobby.) And kicking should be all up to the host (which it already is). There should also be a report option. No not to report dead bodies but on a serious matter. I should be able to report someone that‚Äôs getting out of hand. Like if there was a report button I would immediately report the person who cussed me out and told me to go die. Anyways thanks for reading my review. And innersloth I absolutely love your game but please consider what I said. 
-Thanks

title: Bugs
text:
I love among us. It‚Äôs an amazing game that deserves its popularity. There are some issues I have with it though. I play among us on mobile, and half the time I enter a game, I get kicked out. They say that I sent more then 6 pings? I‚Äôm not sure what that means. Does it mean I talk too much? 
Anyways, the other issue that I‚Äôve come across recently is that my game glitches. Sometimes my avatar freezes, or moves really slowly, and then everything snaps and I either get kicked out of the game, or every thing speeds up and I miss out on a lot of stuff. Also for some reason, I can‚Äôt use ‚Äò? Why can‚Äôt I use ‚Äò?
The one thing I would love to have added would be friend requests, I have met so many amazing players that I will never meet again because I had to leave. I understand that you can‚Äôt just friend someone over just a name, and that there probably has to have an account form added, but I think many players would think the hassle would be worth it. Maybe the account can be optional? 
I really love this game, despite all of the bugs, it‚Äôs always made me laugh and genuinely have a good time. There are just some few issues that need to be fixed for it to be perfect.

title: cool map but...

title: Really like the concept but there are issues
text: So, first thing to say, the game is fun, and a fun game to play when it‚Äôs a rainy day or something, but there are a few things that are quite annoying it say the least. First issue, is an issue that I literally thought of from my first match I played. That issue is that I feel you need to add bots to the game. The reason I want this is because it is quite are to get in a match a lot of the time, not because there aren‚Äôt people playing, but because it is constantly updating, and sometimes the only choices are to just join the servers with like 3 people in them, and sometimes I just can‚Äôt play because of this. Second thing is not as big as an issue, but I think that you should add a friend type system, where you can friend other players. Also, voice chat would be nice. The people who die get forcefully muted and can‚Äôt unmute. Maybe, I don‚Äôt know, but if your going to add an account t system, mine as well add some more stuff to it. Like maybe.. leveling up? Or something like that. But the main concern of all of this, and the only reason it‚Äôs 3 star, is because of the getting into a game issue. But, the game is amazing.

title: Great game
text: I love this game. I play this game everyday at work. It makes the time go by faster but i do have a couple things i would change. There is a lot of glitches. I wish the game came with updates that did away with the glitches. 2. I think the names should only be autogenerated. Children should be presented with the chance to see those then leaving their parents upset or in a difficult spot when they child ask what the word means. There is bullying in this game. title: Suggestions for the game
text: I love among us and I just got good at it, I but Im going to give a few suggestions if that‚Äôs alright. First I would like to say that the imposters should have their own private chat, just so they can work with other imposters because especially in public servers one imposter doesn't always have the other one‚Äôs back. Second, I think there should be cameras in electrical because that is where most people have a fear of being killed or get killed. Third of all, instead of joining a specific game in the public server area, there should be just a button that says ‚Äújoin a game‚Äù and it automatically chooses a game for you so you don‚Äôt disconnect or get one of those annoying messages that says the server is full. Lastly, there should be an edition for people who are colorblind so they don‚Äôt get anything mixed up, because I‚Äôve played with colorblind people before and I‚Äôve seen how upsetting it is for them, and I think they should be able to have fun too. I hope you will consider some of these suggestions, it would mean a lot to me personally.

title: Loved it!...Deleting it now!
text: Among us was awesome! It was a trend first and then just a fun pastime. Finish tasks, find the murderer! Distinguish who‚Äôs lying or try to trick everyone else!  Play with friends! Or You could engage with other people, which, despite language, usually went well and made me feel overall really happy on lonely days. To know that there‚Äôs other people like me and they want to engage with me. Not everyone in the world hates me you know? However the new update ruined it all. Now you can only say certain things.
